data.name: BLACK CHAIR
data.longExplanation: A black chair that will take responsibility for your relaxation.

data.longExplanation: The brown chair is very normal. So people like it more. If you want to be a normal person, don't hesitate to buy.

data.longExplanation: A beggar like you doesnt have this expensive chair. Would you buy it if you had a lot of money?
